reviews.review: [i]Portal[/i] instantly draws you in with its atmosphere and sense of mystery. At first your surroundings seem pristine and untouched, but things quickly reveal themselves to be quite a bit more complicated than that. I do mean quickly too, this game only takes about two hours to beat. The music is really cool and helps pick up some of the slack that the visuals should've been carrying. The puzzles themselves are neat but once you beat them they will never present a challenge again meaning this game isn't very replayable. There's a few bonus puzzles after the main game  though and they're actually really hard and took me a little while to beat.

По моему мнению это одна из лучших игр VALVE. Она сочитает в себе неплохой юмор, интерестный сюжет и захватывающий гемплей. По десятибальной шкале оценил бы на крепкую 9.
Funny game.
Çözüm yolu için düşündüren ve düşündükçe eğlendiren tek oturuşta harcadığım baş yapıt...
игра на логику, очень классная мне понравилось сюжет просто топ графики прям шик, все прям нравится прохожу миллионы раз и просто топ.

Being a Game, originally designed by a group of Indie-Developers, it feels like an Indie Game which is just published by a Big Publisher.

The Puzzles feel like they are well thought out and the extra Chmaber-Challenges and Hard Cambers make the game more enjoyable over a longer duration of time. The Story is transmitted greatly by GLaDOS and the way the Puzzles are increasing in difficulty, feels great and solving them is a satisfying experience.

Portal also is a great Speed game being able to rush through most of the Puzzles easily, after struggling on them in the first Play through, is as, if not more satisfying than actually finding the solutions of the Puzzles themselves.

Anyone that has the plan of buying Portal should give it a try and if the Casual Play through isn't satisfying enough, you should definitely try to beat the Game as fast as possible.

My Rating: 9.5/10

No hay nada que no se haya dicho de Portal. Es sin duda uno de los mejores videojuegos de la historia, con mecánicas innovadoras, un gran toque de humor, y desafíos constates que te ponen a prueba. Y, a pesar de que es tan corto, sin duda alcanzó limites inimaginables. Limites que tan solo rompería su secuela: Portal 2.

This is an amazing game from the start! I will not spoil it for you but here are some Pros:

- You travel around in Portals

- Funny jokes

- Iconic gameplay

- The community is awesome

Now here are some cons:

- Some glitches make the game not fun, others make it fun

That's the only con I can think of, its an amazing game! I hold it dear to my heart  because it was one of the first source engine games I played and in my opinion one of the most fun! I give this game an 8/10 if you wish to play it today. It was a game of its time period but now Portal 2 has taken its place as the best portal game. But this is the original, that is not always better though!

WARNING: This review will most likely be spoiler heavy. If you haven't played the game yet, go do that.

Portal, stylized P0RTAL, is a game that was, and still is, groundbreaking for its time. At least, in the industry of polished video games.

Concepts for the game had already been developed and released, with Portal itself being based off of an independent developer's work, entitled "Narbacular Drop". The work had less similarities with Portal, but had a core concept in it. Place portal one place, place another portal somewhere else, and walk through them to complete puzzles/challenges. I don't know much about the game, so I won't go too in depth.

One of the things that makes Portal so immersive is its story. Erik Wolpaw was a writer for the game, working with Chet Faliszek, to make a story that tells itself through drips and not flows. This kind of story-telling makes the universe that Portal is in seem mysterious. It's subtly hinted at that Portal takes place in the universe of Half-Life 2, a detail which most other people playing this game wouldn't spot on their first playthrough. You can spot Black Mesa's logo as one of the many images GLADos displays at the end of the game. Speaking of which.

There are barely any characters in the original Portal. The most we get is a protagonist and an antagonist. The protagonist is Chell, the silent protagonist of Portal. What makes her slightly different from most other protagonists in Valve's games is that she usually doesn't wield a gun, but a portal gun. Also, she's a woman. The antagonist is GLADos, that is a robot. The protagonist usually doesn't interact with GLADos until the very end of the story, when an "epic" boss battle occurs. GLADos can filter the entire facility with neurotoxins, but is basically stopped doing so by the "cores" GLADos has. Or, I guess had. 

There are many things that many other reviews have covered, but I'm trying to cover some things. If you want a full review, go on YouTube or read the most helpful reviews here. My review is probably gonna be buried under the hundreds of better ones.

Reputo il seguente titolo molto stimolante per l'utente e sicuramente rivoluzionario a suo tempo. Potrebbe risultare rapido da completare ma solamente se non si tenta il pieno completamento dei vari obiettivi oppure a vincere le varie sfide disponibili. Facilmente uno dei giochi più interessanti a cui abbia mai giocato.

It's a classic for a reason. The sheer personality oozing from this beautiful puzzle-platformer is worth the price by itself, but then they give you some fun and innovative, if occasionally fiddly, gameplay and a solid plot to boot. 
I'd never even played it until I got it here in, what, '19? '18? Very little to say that hasn't been said since the '07 release, but I'm praising it anyway. Good show, Valve.

2020년 기준으로는 약간 식상한 느낌이 조금 있긴 합니다.
하지만 출시 기준으로 진짜 혁신적인 게임이었다고 생각해요.
진짜 대단한 게임입니다. 포탈3를 핲라잎3만큼 왜 기다리는지 이유를 알겠어요.

저는 솔직히 포탈이 그렇게 대단한 게임인 줄 몰랐습니다.

2020년 여름 세일이라 가격 채우려고 산 감이 없잖아 있습니다.

저렴하게 구입했음에도 불구하고 진짜 너무 싸게 사서 미안할 정도의
엄청난 게임이었습니다.

DC인사이드에서 괴상망측한 포탈 망가(?)를 본 이후로 충격에 휩싸여
그렇게나 빨만한(?) 게임인가 해서 샀습니다.
기대 이상의 수확이었어요.

챕터 14부터 꽤 어려워지기 시작합니다.
극 후반부는 조금 억지스러운 부분이 분명히 있긴 합니다만...

공략 18 중간에 한번 빼곤 순수하게 4시간만에 다 깼네요.

멀미 때문에 이틀에 걸쳐서 깼습니다.
멀미만 아니었다면 하루만에 쭉 달렸겠지만... 그래도 이틀 동안 즐거웠어요.
Игра просто сказка, сюжет хоть и маленький, но очень интересный, пройти нужно обязательно.
